name: Free Spire.PDFConverter for .NET
short_description:
Free Spire.PDFConverter for .NET Component is a Community Edition of Spire.PDFConvert, which can help you convert popular files to PDF format. It includes converting Excel to PDF, Word to PDF, HTML to PDF, Text to PDF and Images to PDF. Free Spire.PDFConverter for .NET can convert any kind of images (JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, etc.) to PDF.

Free Spire.PDFConverter for .NET enables user to add whole folders to convert. It can automatically recognize files which are available to be converted to PDF. Furthermore, Free Spire.PDFConverter for .NET allows user to set output folder and open the folder at once after conversion, which is very convenient to preview the output PDF files immediately. Free Spire.PDFConverter for .NET is 100% Free PDFConverter. It is very easy to use and suitable for all levels of users.
